G

GameController - Class in src.main.java.gameComponents
PROTOTYPE Controls the overall flow of the game, managing turn order and the current GameState.
GameController(Board) - Constructor for class src.main.java.gameComponents.GameController
Constructs a GameController with a given board, sets the initial GameState to STARTING, and randomly picks which player (RED or BLUE) goes first.
gameLoop() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.GameController
Outlines the main game loop logic based on GameState.
GameState - Enum in src.main.java.gameComponents
Represents the various states the game can be in: STARTING (players place workers), RUNNING (standard game loop), ENDED (game has a winner).
getBoard() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Board
Returns the entire 2D array of cells for this board.
getColor() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Player
Returns this player's color.
getCurrentID() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.IDMaker
Returns the current value of the incremental ID without incrementing it.
getHeight() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Board
Returns the height of the whole board (standard rules: 5).
getHeight() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Cell
Returns the height of the tower in this cell (shortcut).
getHeight() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Tower
Returns the integer height of this tower.
getID() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Worker
Returns the unique ID of this worker.
getInstance() - Static method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.IDMaker
Returns the single instance of IDMaker.
getNextID() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.IDMaker
Increments and returns the next unique ID.
getPlayer() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Worker
Returns the color of the player controlling this worker.
getPos() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Cell
Returns the [x, y] coordinates of this cell.
getStatus() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Cell
Returns the WorkerStatus of this cell (PRESENT/ABSENT).
getTower() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Cell
Returns the Tower located in this cell.
getWidth() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Board
Returns the width of the whole board (standard rules: 5).
getWorker() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Cell
Returns the Worker in this cell (may be null if no Worker is present).
getWorkers() - Method in class src.main.java.gameComponents.Player
Returns the two workers belonging to this player.
